item.title: Welcome to Go
item.description: Golang als gemeinsame Sprache In January 2020 I took the chance to present my talk “Welcome to Go” about the Go Programming Language at Guild42.ch. Guild42.ch is an association that organizes events on topics related to software development in Berne, Switzerland. Over 85 developers from around Berne were interested in the topic. Until there I was telling only Swiss Post stuff about Golang and argued about why the language is very useful.
